contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=September 2010}} {{Cleanup|date=September 2010}} '''Neville A. Stanton''' is a [[United Kingdom|British]] Professor of [[Human Factors]] and [[Ergonomics]] at the [[University of Southampton]]. He has written and edited over a dozen books and a hundred peer-reviewed journal papers on applications of the subject. Professor Stanton is a Fellow of the [[British Psychological Society]] and a Fellow of the [[The Institute of Ergonomics and Human Factors]] and a member of the [[Institution of Engineering and Technology]]. He has been published in many academic journals as well as ''[[Nature (journal)|Nature]]''. He has also helped organisations design new human-machine interfaces, such as the [[Adaptive Cruise Control]] system for [[Jaguar Cars]]. Other work includes assessment of [[human reliability]] in high risk systems, evaluation of [[control room]] interfaces, layouts, work design, social organisation and environment, and [[product design]]. He teaches courses on Human Factors methods, [[User Centred Design]] and [[Usability]]. His research interests are wide and varied, including [[situation awareness]], [[task analysis]], cognitive work analysis, [[human error]], [[socio-technical systems]], natualistic [[decision making]] and human reactions in [[emergencies]]. More detail on his publications can be found on the [[University of Southampton]] website. ==External links== *[http://www.civil.soton.ac.uk/staff/staffbydivision/staffprofile.asp?NameID=475 Neville Stanton's page at the University of Southampton] *[http://www.ashgate.com/default.aspx?page=1249&calctitle=1&pageSubject=3019 Neville Stanton's book series on Human Factors in Defence] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780754646600 Neville Stanton's book on Human Factors methods] *[http://www.crcpress.com/product/isbn/9780415287005;jsessionid=fx9hjTf7BGacwg05hduy5w** Neville Stanton's other book on Human Factors methods] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780754670278 Neville Stanton's book on Modelling Command and Control] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780754677598 Neville Stanton's book on Digitising Command and Control] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780291398499 Neville Stanton's book on Human Factors in Auditory Warnings] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780754670582 Neville Stanton's book on Distributed Situation Awareness] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780754670261 Neville Stanton's book on Cognitive Work Analysis] *[http://www.ashgate.com/isbn/9780754672654 Neville Stanton's book on Sociotechnical Systems] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Stanton, Neville A. | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = British academic | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Stanton, Neville A.}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Academics of the University of Southampton]] {{UK-academic-bio-stub}}
